data.Name: Climate.Careers
data.Tagline: We're mobilizing the world’s talent to solve the climate crisis.
data.About:
Climate.Careers is mobilizing the world’s talent to solve the climate crisis. Our online platform connects mission-driven jobseekers to high-impact, high-paying jobs at organizations working to reverse climate change.

Our framework for impact is based on Project Drawdown's list of evidence-based solutions to reverse global warming, and is designed to support the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals.
